text:
@GovernorTomWolf As U.S. coronavirus deaths pass 120,000, remember 

Just 3 months ago Donald Trump  
👉rejected all intelligence, medical & scientific reports
👉and announced to our nation the number of #Covid cases in US would SOON dwindle down to ZERO

https://t.co/9vSppG8w4w
